name: Retro Night Drive
description:
Take an endless drive on this retro futuristic neon raceway, collecting pickups to aid in your nostalgic cruise.

You must race against the clock to survive as long as you can.

Just remember, you're hundreds of metres above the freeway, so avoid the obstacles and don't drive off!

Controls:

W - Accelerate
A / D - Turn
Release W - Brake to minimum speed

Arrow Keys - Same as above

This game was made for the Pizza Jam, hope you enjoy!
